root.name: The Sims: Carnival - SnapCity
root.description: Sims Carnival: SnapCity is a game produced by Electronic Arts. The gameplay is a combination of SimCity and Tetris, where the player must move and rotate falling pieces to build a city. The fling piees are shaped like those of Tetris, only on a flat plane, and represent the three zones of SimCity (residential, commercial, and industrial). The player must also build roadways so these zones may grow. There are also special zones that must be placed and filled so the player may have special buildings such as police stations, parks, and junk yards. The game has a disaster phase which consists of focusing on an icon and pressing the action button/left mouse button until the didsaster goes away.
